link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK (File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 异常 Monet 颜色 (v1.11.3 起存在)
  2. 修复 非自动主题下，部分对话框文本颜色反转
  3. 改进 支持重置文件过滤器设置
  4. 新增 添加“扫描媒体”快捷方式，若无内容可显示
  5. 开发 使用 JDK 21 构建
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: glitchy Monet colors (since v1.11.3)
  2. Fix: inverted text color on some dialogs in non-auto theme
  3. Improve: support resetting Path Filter settings
  4. New: add the shortcut of 'Scan Media' if no items to display
  5. Development: build with JDK 21

link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK (File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 新增 支持编辑多艺术家与多流派的分隔符
  2. 改进 切换 'Music Library Provider' 模式后无需重启
releaseNote.en:
1. New: support editing separators for tags of multiple artists and genres
  2. Improve: there is no need to reboot after switching 'Music Library Provider' mode

link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK (File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 注意 此为首个处理复杂标签关系的的公开早期预览版
  2. 新增 添加实验性选项“Music Library Provider”，用于启用解析复杂标签关系的数据库作为数据源
  3. 新增 支持解析并组织由 “;”、 “/”、 “&”、 “ft.” 分隔的多艺术家标签
  4. 新增 支持解析并组织由 “;”、 “,”、 “&” 分隔的多流派标签
releaseNote.en:
1. Note: this is the first public Early Preview version with enhanced database for complex tag relationship
  2. New: Experimental setting option 'Music Library Provider' in 'Advanced', to enable new database as the source for parsed complex tag relationship
  3. New: support parsing and reorganizing multiple artists split by ';', '/', '&', 'ft.' in relative tags
  4. New: support parsing and reorganizing multiple genres split by ';', ',', '&' in genre tag
